verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
We want to worship you
We want to worship you
Lift to you
Our hightest praise
We want to worship you

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Lord we do worship you
Lord we do worship you
Lift to you
Our highest praise
Lord we do worship you

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Lord we do praise your name
Lord we do praise your name
Lift to you
Our highest praise
Lord we do praise your name
